note:
I’m a UX Designer for an agricultural services company in the United States. I also do a lot of graphic design work there as we all wear a lot of different hats at my company.

I enjoy hiking, music (rock & blues), reading (speculative fiction, mostly), billiards.

I’m a deep blue liberal living in a red state.
